video:video.video:title: From Zero to Business Application in 15 minutes
video:video.video:description: Visual Studio LightSwitch is the simplest way to build business applications for the desktop and cloud. LightSwitch simplifies the development process by letting you concentrate on the business&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Interactive Devices @ Microsoft (Future Interactions with Computers)
video:video.video:description: The computing mouse has achieved a great deal for a device that's conceptually over four decades old. Indeed its mainly because of this device that we have the Graphical User Interface (GUI),&#8230;

video:video.video:title: DevDays ALM Preconf Adopting Continuous integration
video:video.video:description: Agile and in particular SCRUM are becoming the defacto choice of companies who are looking to improve software development practices. Every aspect of application development - requirements,&#8230;

video:video.video:title: DevDays ALM Preconf Improve the developer workflow
video:video.video:description: Agile and in particular SCRUM are becoming the defacto choice of companies who are looking to improve software development practices. Every aspect of application development - requirements,&#8230;

video:video.video:title: DevDays ALM Preconf Agile Testing
video:video.video:description: Agile and in particular SCRUM are becoming the defacto choice of companies who are looking to improve software development practices. Every aspect of application development - requirements,&#8230;

video:video.video:title: DevDays ALM Preconf Adopting Scrum
video:video.video:description: Agile and in particular SCRUM are becoming the defacto choice of companies who are looking to improve software development practices. Every aspect of application development - requirements,&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Entity Framework in de Praktijk
video:video.video:description: Met ADO.NET Entity Framework maak je eenvoudig een verbinding tussen code en database. Dat zie je in ASP.NET Dynamic Data en Visual Studio Lightswitch. In je project wil je naast standaard data access&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Best Practices for Producing Best-in-class Installations
video:video.video:description: Join us as we talk through how to support new development trends with unparalleled support for Microsoft technologies including application virtualization (App-V), Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Developing SaaS Solutions with the Windows Azure Platform
video:video.video:description: Come to this session to learn about how to take advantage of the Windows Azure platform for developing and running your subscription based applications.

video:video.video:title: SharePoint 2010 en Fast
video:video.video:description: Aan de hand van demos met out of the box webparts, configuratie van Fast en het developen van zowel custom webparts als extensions op Fast, wordt getoond hoe krachtig Fast voor SharePoint is.

video:video.video:title: WCF Data Services Introductie - De Serverkant
video:video.video:description: In deze Power Sessie wordt een introductie gegeven op WCF Data Services waarbij code demos niet geschuwd worden.

video:video.video:title: Toegankelijk Bouwen de ROI van Kwaliteit
video:video.video:description: Via toegankelijkheid help je mensen met beperkingen. Met de hands-on tips &amp; trucs in deze workshop ontdek je hoe je met weinig extra moeite deze slag maakt voor je klanten.

video:video.video:title: Developing Java based cloud solutions using Windows Azure Plugin for Eclipse
video:video.video:description: During this session I will show how to get your Java EE Application Server infrastructure up and running and how you can package your Java applications for cloud deployment.

video:video.video:title: Creating sites, Site Definitions, Web Templates and Custom Code
video:video.video:description: This session will talk about the pros and cons of the different approaches. After this session you should be able to determine the right approach for your specific scenario.

video:video.video:title: Database Migration Done Right
video:video.video:description: In this session you will learn how to successfully migrate from Oracle, Sybase, DB2, MySQL and other non-Microsoft Database Platforms.

video:video.video:title: SharePoint in de Cloud!
video:video.video:description: Ontdek hoe je ondanks de opgelegde beperkingen toch geavanceerde resultaten bereikt. Maak kennis met interessante technieken en wordt de baas van de cloud!

video:video.video:title: How Smart Use Cases Can Drive Web Development
video:video.video:description: Using real-life code examples Sander will demonstrate how to model, generate and build smart use cases and introduce the positive impact smart use cases have on your layered software architecture.

video:video.video:title: Windows Phone 7: Fast Starting and State Saving Windows Phone 7 Applications
video:video.video:description: After attending this presentation, your Windows Phone 7 Tombstone headaches will be history and your end users will be happy with your fast starting applications.

video:video.video:title: Code Like a Ninja: Enhance your Productivity with Visual Studio
video:video.video:description: This session covers features of Visual Studio make you more productive as a developer. It covers items of interest from novice to advanced developers. Why waste your time typing? Code like a Ninja!

video:video.video:title: A Lap Around Visual Studio 2010 Application Lifecycle Management
video:video.video:description: In this demo-rich session we will take a tour of many of the new capabilities of Visual Studio 2010 for application lifecycle management.

video:video.video:title: Extended Events comes of age in SQL Server Denali
video:video.video:description: After a quick review of how Extended Events work, I&rsquo;ll cover the enhancements in detail. In addition to more events, Extended Events also exposed in the Denali SQL Server PowerShell provider and&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Designing Windows Phone Applications met Expression Blend
video:video.video:description: In deze sessie zie je hoe Microsoft Expression Blend gebruikt kan worden voor het ontwerpen van Windows Phone applicaties.

video:video.video:title: Application Performance on Windows Phone 7
video:video.video:description: In deze sessie worden praktische tips gegeven hoe je de performance van jouw Windows Phone 7 applicaties kunt optimaliseren.

video:video.video:title: Introductie Code Contract
video:video.video:description: In deze sessie geven we een korte introductie over de werking en voordelen van code contracts. Henk geeft een overzicht van de nieuwe code contracts tools in Visual Studio 2010.

video:video.video:title: Breng de Wereld in Kaart met ESRI
video:video.video:description: De Esri ArcGIS API voor Silverlight/WPF maakt het mogelijk om in Visual Studio 2010 of Expression Blend 4 jouw idee&euml;n letterlijk in kaart te brengen.

video:video.video:title: WCF Web APIs, HTTP your way
video:video.video:description: Are you building Web APIs for reaching any device, enabling mash-ups, or providing highly connected Web experiences? Then come to this session and learn how to build Web APIs your way with WCF.

video:video.video:title: Agile Project Management with Scrum and Team Foundation Server 2010
video:video.video:description: In this session you will see how Visual Studio Team Foundation Server (TFS) 2010, Microsoft's Application Lifecycle Management platform and Scrum, a proven project management framework, play together&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Outloud: Send your Complains to the Cloud
video:video.video:description: This session addresses an end-to-end scenario for building a Windows Phone 7 application that takes advantage of the top features of the phone OS as well as using the Cloud.

video:video.video:title: Overview of forthcoming SQL-Azure Services, SQL Azure Data Sync and SQL Azure Reporting
video:video.video:description: In this session you&rsquo;ll learn about the capabilities of these new services, in what scenarios they can be used and see them in action.

video:video.video:title: Introduction to Razor
video:video.video:description: Razor is web development op het scherpst van de snede: de nieuwste view engine voor het maken van web pagina&rsquo;s in ASP.NET. In deze sessie maak je kennis met de Razor syntax in zowel C# als VB.

video:video.video:title: Ubiquitous Communication with the Windows Azure Service Bus
video:video.video:description: Christian shows you how to build mighty cross-platform communication patterns like publish/subscribe &ndash; all in a secure manner, programmed with WCF or pure REST.

video:video.video:title: LINQ Take Two - Realizing the LINQ to Everything Dream
video:video.video:description: Based on the theory of monads, we&rsquo;ll explore the incredibly powerful nature of query comprehensions and after this talk, you&rsquo;ll truly understand the (underestimated) power that LINQ has&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Tips, Tricks and Techniques for Building Killer Silverlight Applications
video:video.video:description: Writing Silverlight applications is easy; writing GREAT Silverlight applications is not. This session presents numerous tips and tricks for building applications that sizzle.

video:video.video:title: WP7 voor .NET Developers: Van Idee naar Inkomen
video:video.video:description: Met de kennis uit deze sessie moet elke developer in staat zijn om een Windows Phone 7 app te bouwen, publiceren en er eventueel wat mee te verdienen.

video:video.video:title: Deep Dive into Microsoft Data Warehouse
video:video.video:description: In this session you will learn all about Microsoft Data Warehousing platforms, Fast Track Data Warehouse, SQL Server 2008 R2 Parallel Data Warehouse.

video:video.video:title: TFS Best Practices TFS Reporting: Garbage In - Garbage Out
video:video.video:description: Hoe worden deze rapporten nou eigenlijk gevoed? Welke data moet je opslaan? Wie slaat deze data op? Welke processen moeten draaien en wat moet je aanpassen om de juiste data te krijgen?

video:video.video:title: Entity Framework 4 Tips en Tricks
video:video.video:description: In deze sessie gaan wij naar een aantal tips en tricks kijken die zijn te gebruiken met het het Entity Framework 4.

video:video.video:title: HTML 5: De Praktische Introductie
video:video.video:description: In deze sessie gaat het niet alleen om &ldquo;wat is er mogelijk&rdquo;, maar vooral ook &ldquo;hoe maak ik het&rdquo;. Dus praktijkgericht aan de slag met demo&rsquo;s en code.

video:video.video:title: Leveraging Azure in Heterogeneous Environments
video:video.video:description: In this session we will show you what the Windows Azure platform offers to non- Microsoft platforms (with the focus on the Java platform).

video:video.video:title: Windows Phone 7 Push Notifications
video:video.video:description: In deze sessie vertellen we je alles wat er is te vertellen over het notification systeem van Windows Phone 7.

video:video.video:title: Windows Azure AppFabric Access Control Service: Deep Dive
video:video.video:description: In this session we will take a detailed look at how ACS can help you to broker authentication between your application and many different providers.

video:video.video:title: Automating Quality Assurance with Team Foundation Server 2010
video:video.video:description: This session is all about automated build, tests, continuous integration, gated check-ins, and quality assurance using the newest products from the Visual Studio 2010 family.

video:video.video:title: Hoe kun je een Applicatie naar de Azure Cloud Migreren?
video:video.video:description: In deze sessie wordt aan de hand van een voorbeeld duidelijk gemaakt welke keuzes moeten worden gemaakt gebaseerd op de ervaringen van diverse migraties.

video:video.video:title: Building RIA Applications with Silverlight, Blend and Visual Studio
video:video.video:description: In this code focused session, you will see how to build an end-to-end Silverlight data centric business application using WCF RIA Services.

video:video.video:title: Advanced Debugging with Visual Studio 2010
video:video.video:description: In the newest version of Ingo's classic talk you will learn how to make the most out of your debugging time with Visual Studio 2010 and will see the most important advanced debugging techniques.

video:video.video:title: Applied Software Testing with Visual Studio 2010
video:video.video:description: In this session we'll attempt to send you home with a list of ways you can fine-tune your testing process to ensure you're making the most effective use of Visual Studio 2010's testing capabilities.

video:video.video:title: SQL Server Performance: Query Plans
video:video.video:description: Deze sessie gaat dieper in op de operators die je in een query plan tegenkomt en het herkennen en verbeteren van een slecht query plan.

video:video.video:title: Demystifying the .NET Asynchronous Programming Landscape
video:video.video:description: In this session, we explore various methodologies to address asynchronous programming, and explain how they relate and differ.

video:video.video:title: I Used to be an ASP.NET Developer but my Job went to SharePoint
video:video.video:description: In deze sessie laten we je zien wat het betekent als je werkomgeving de overstap maakt van ASP.NET en SharePoint.

video:video.video:title: Introductie Entity Framework Code First
video:video.video:description: Tevens leggen we deze nieuwe feature naast bestaande opties als EF Database First en EF Model First en bespreken we de voor- en nadelen van het gebruik.

video:video.video:title: Software Kwaliteit is Geen Grap!
video:video.video:description: Deze sessie is een kans om te beginnen het "slechte autogarage"-imago van de software-branch af te schudden!

video:video.video:title: SharePoint Client Object Model
video:video.video:description: In deze sessie ga je door middel van een goede dosis achtergrond en talrijke demo&rsquo;s van A tot Z door het client object model heen. Waar moet je op letten, wat zijn best practices, deze sessie&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Implementing M-V-VM (Model-View-View Model) for WPF
video:video.video:description: In this session we will build an app that shows how the M-V-VM pattern is utilized for building SOLID WPF applications that are also testable.

video:video.video:title: LightSwitch Advanced Development and Customization Techniques
video:video.video:description: In the session you will see techniques for building sophisticated UI, implementing middle tier application logic by customizing the data update pipeline and much more without leaving the LightSwitch&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Windows Phone and XNA for Fun, Games, Profit and Physics
video:video.video:description: In this session you will find out how to create your own games using C#, Visual Studio 2010 and XNA and run them on the phone.

video:video.video:title: Windows Azure AppFabric Service Bus: Messaging, Pub/Sub, and Connectivity in and through the Cloud
video:video.video:description: Clemens will provide an overview of Service Bus as it is currently available for commercial use and will provide a detailed outlook on the new Service Bus features that will soon become available.

video:video.video:title: Real World Architecture with ASP.NET MVC
video:video.video:description: In this session we'll discover how to create applications from the ground up; architectural concerns, infrastructure, testing, data access, view models and domain models will be covered.

video:video.video:title: Real World Windows Azure Development Tip & Tricks
video:video.video:description: This session focused on demos to show attendees the best way to use Visual Studio 2010 to develop Windows Azure applications.

video:video.video:title: Silverlight vs. HTML5: An Apples-to-Apples Comparision
video:video.video:description: See Silverlight and HTML5 side by side and judge for yourself whether there&rsquo;s room for both platforms in the Web of tomorrow. The answer may surprise you!

video:video.video:title: Programming Filestreams and RBS in SQL Server 2008 R2
video:video.video:description: This talk covers the aspects of defining and programming filestreams in SQL Server using Transact-SQL, ADO.NET, OLE DB, and ODBC.

video:video.video:title: Monitoring and Managing your Azure Solution
video:video.video:description: tbd

video:video.video:title: LAB Management in de Praktijk
video:video.video:description: Lab Management is een van de nieuwe features van Visual Studio 2010. Deze sessie laat zien hoe je Lab Management gebruikt.

video:video.video:title: Improving Legacy .NET Code
video:video.video:description: In deze sessie zie je hoe je de bestaande structuur inzichtelijk kunt maken, stapsgewijs tests kunt toevoegen, onderdelen kunt isoleren en wat je wel en niet kunt en moet refactoren.

video:video.video:title: Using SharePoint Search to Develop Custom Solutions
video:video.video:description: This session will show some examples and will explain how to go about building your own custom solutions leveraging the SharePoint Search functionality.

video:video.video:title: SQL Server & Powershell
video:video.video:description: In this action packed session you will see how to create cmdlets yourself by using SMO and ADO.NET and how to make your life with SQL Server easier.

video:video.video:title: Declarative Refactoring in C#
video:video.video:description: You will learn how to fully utilize the C# language to assign functionality where it belongs, make your code readable even for that future you, and in the process end up with a reusable framework.

video:video.video:title: Identity & Access Control in the Cloud
video:video.video:description: We will show you how to simplify your user experience by enabling users to sign in with an existing account such as a Windows Live ID, or on-premises Active Directory account.

video:video.video:title: Real World Azure: Elasticity from On-premise to Cloud (and Back)
video:video.video:description: In this session, Christian shows you one example of how you can leverage the pros of Windows Azure and SQL Azure in order to expand your web-based data-driven applications from a local installation&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Parallelism, Asynchrony and Beyond
video:video.video:description: Come to this session to learn how TPL in .NET 4 and beyond will help you to drastically reduce the amount of code you need to write when building parallel, concurrent, and asynchronous applications.

video:video.video:title: Fast Application Switching in Windows Phone 7 codename Mango
video:video.video:description: One of the most exciting new features coming to the next version of Windows Phone is the ability for users to switch quickly between running third party applications. Learn how this is going to work,&#8230;

video:video.video:title: A Developers Tour Around Expression Blend
video:video.video:description: In this session we&rsquo;ll take a demo-based lap around Expression Blend, introducing the workspace and the environment and focusing on how to use specific features.

video:video.video:title: HTML 5 - That's What You Need to Know Today!
video:video.video:description: In this code-heavy session, Ingo will show you what HTML 5 (the driving force behind most of today's browser development) offers today.

video:video.video:title: Stepping into the Near Future of the IDE
video:video.video:description: Mark Miller will explore trends in tools &amp; human interfaces and preview interesting, exciting, and slightly surreal possibilities from the &ldquo;bleeding edge&rdquo; that may be converging to a&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Windows Phone in Rhyme and 3D
video:video.video:description: Discover the joys of great English poetry and 3D in a lecture that will also show you how to write your first Windows Phone application entirely in rhyme.

video:video.video:title: Coding for Fun with Scott Hanselman
video:video.video:description: Scott shares some of the small open source and blogging projects he&rsquo;s working on. We&rsquo;ll see his JQuery powered webcam, automated remote Office Communicator, and more!

video:video.video:title: Mission-Critical SQLCLR Internals and Best Practices
video:video.video:description: This talk covers the internal of how SQLCLR works in SQL Server to give you the knowledge to architect and troubleshoot SQLCLR-based database applications.

video:video.video:title: Azure Diagnostics, Azure Service Management en Elasticity
video:video.video:description: Riccardo laat zien hoe je een workerrole kan promoveren tot elasticiteitagent en laat verschillende codefragmenten zien hoe je dit fenomeen ook in je eigen omgeving toe kan voegen.

video:video.video:title: CQRS op Windows Azure
video:video.video:description: In deze sessie zie je hoe je zelf een CQRS implementatie kunt maken op Windows Azure, maar ook welke frameworks al geschikt gemaakt zijn voor de cloud.

video:video.video:title: Understanding the Windows Phone 7 Development Tools
video:video.video:description: This sample-filled session explains when to use Microsoft Expression Blend and when to use Microsoft Visual Studio, from a software development perspective.

video:video.video:title: Kwalitatief Goede Software: Tools en Technieken
video:video.video:description: Het bouwen van kwalitatief goede software kan worden ondersteund door een aantal tools en technieken. Thomas en Ronald zien wat je kunt doen om de kwaliteit van je software te verhogen.

video:video.video:title: Debugging your Azure Applications
video:video.video:description: Debugging your Windows Azure applications varies from adding statements that write custom log information in your code to using the IntelliTrace feature of Visual Studio 2010 Ultimate edition.

video:video.video:title: Building Robust, Maintainable Coded UI Tests with Visual Studio 2010
video:video.video:description: In this demo-rich session we will examine patterns and practices you can employ for building great coded UI tests.

video:video.video:title: AppFabric Caching On-premises and in the Cloud
video:video.video:description: In this session, we&rsquo;ll discuss design patterns to show how your existing or new applications can be quickly built to leverage caching capabilities via the ASP.NET session state provider.

video:video.video:title: Test Driving ASP.NET MVC
video:video.video:description: In this session you will learn to test your routes, controllers, and models BDD style with MSpec and MbUnit, and use the free WebAii framework to certify the user interface.

video:video.video:title: Visual Studio LightSwitch - Beyond the Basics
video:video.video:description: You&rsquo;ll see how to extend LightSwitch applications with your own Silverlight custom controls and RIA services

video:video.video:title: REST, ROA, and Reach: Building Applications for Maximum Interoperability
video:video.video:description: In this talk, we&rsquo;ll get a common understanding of what REST and ROA is and then take a look at how these things allow us to expose our services to the widest possible audience.

video:video.video:title: Behind the Scenes of 10 C# Language Features
video:video.video:description: During this demo-intensive session, we&rsquo;ll look behind the scenes of no less than ten C# language features, explaining how they&rsquo;re implemented and what some of the implications are.

video:video.video:title: What's New in Silverlight 5
video:video.video:description: Get the scoop on all the new features of the platform and go home with sample code demonstrating how to use them to build a whole new generation of Silverlight applications.

video:video.video:title: Spatial Features in SQL Server "Denali" en het Gebruik ervan in Silverlight
video:video.video:description: Bekeken zal worden hoe een Spatial dataset uit SQL Server "Denali" via het Entity Framework 4 en WCF RIA Services efficient te serveren valt voor een Silverlight applicatie.

video:video.video:title: SQL Server Reporting Services for Developers, Options and Challenges
video:video.video:description: This session is meant to show from a developers perspective that Reporting Services is a valuable add-on for your application development.

video:video.video:title: SharePoint Deployment Automation met ROSS en R-1
video:video.video:description: Deze sessie laat zien hoe je deze uitrol uitvoert met behulp van de tooling ROSS en R-1. Kom kijken en leer hoe je SharePoint oplossingen in recordtijd van ontwikkelomgeving naar productie uitrolt.

video:video.video:title: Speaking OData to SharePoint 2010 in a RESTful Manner
video:video.video:description: Kom je steeds vaker termen als REST en OData tegen maar weet je eigenlijk niet waar het voor staat? Dan ben je hier op de juiste plek!

video:video.video:title: Introductie Code Contract
video:video.video:description: In deze sessie geven we een korte introductie over de werking en voordelen van code contracts. Henk geeft een overzicht van de nieuwe code contracts tools in Visual Studio 2010.

video:video.video:title: Overzicht van Silverlight voor Windows Phone Toolkit
video:video.video:description: In deze sessie zie je wat de mogelijkheden van deze extra componenten uitgebracht voor het ontwikkelen van de Windows Phone applicaties zijn.

video:video.video:title: Sandboxed Solutions Deep Dive
video:video.video:description: This session will cover very quickly the basics of Sandboxed Solutions but focuses on the more advanced topics including Full Trust Proxies and Solution Validation.

video:video.video:title: Science of Great UI
video:video.video:description: Explore the how and why of great UI. If you believe you&rsquo;re not an artist, that UI is merely subjective, or that a great UI is not worth the effort, then this session is for you.

video:video.video:title: Produceer Betere Product Kwaliteit door Gebruik te Maken van de Ultimate Test Tools
video:video.video:description: Naar deze sessie weet je hoe de verschillende tools met elkaar samen werken en hoe je een combinatie van deze tools kunt inzetten betere kwaliteit te leveren in een zeer korte tijd.

video:video.video:title: Taking Control of your World with the .NET Micro Framework
video:video.video:description: If you have never thought of writing embedded code then this session is for you. With lots of working hardware, from wrist watch controlled robots to blog powered festive lights.

video:video.video:title: Intro to the Workflow Services and Windows Server AppFabric
video:video.video:description: In this session we will see how to build workflow services and how to use Windows Server AppFabric to configure and manage them.

video:video.video:title: A Lap Around SQL Azure
video:video.video:description: Come see how easy it is to provision and develop against SQL Azure using your existing skills and technologies.

video:video.video:title: NuGet In Depth: Empowering Open Source on the .NET Platform
video:video.video:description: Scott digs into the new open source NuGet package management system. NuGet is an open source project hosted on Mercurial and we&rsquo;ll talk about why Microsoft is getting serious about open source.

video:video.video:title: Full text Search in SQL Server 2008 and Denali
video:video.video:description: This talk covers the architecture of SQL Server Full text search in SQL Server 2008 and some major improvements in SQL Server Denali.

video:video.video:title: SharePoint Features en Solution Upgrading
video:video.video:description: Deze presentatie gaat in op het feature en solution framework, wanneer pas je feature upgrade toe en hoe ga je om met het upgraden van bestaande geactiveerde en niet-geactiveerde features.

video:video.video:title: Green Code Required: Essential Application Development Practices for Efficient and Sustainable IT
video:video.video:description: We illustrate important concepts and design principles that developers must follow to maximize end user and energy productivity.

video:video.video:title: De Locatie Centraal met Windows Phone 7
video:video.video:description: Met behulp van de ArcGIS API voor Windows Phone 7 kun je deze locatie-gerelateerde applicaties ontwikkelen.

video:video.video:title: Performance Optimalisatie met de Task Parallel Library
video:video.video:description: De in .NET 4.0 ge&iuml;ntroduceerde Task Parallel Library kan je helpen al je cores zo effici&euml;nt mogelijk te gebruiken.

video:video.video:title: Upgrading to SQL Server 2008 R2 and SQL Server Denali
video:video.video:description: By the end of this session you&rsquo;ll understand the key steps involved in the upgrade process. You will learn how to assess upgrade issues, and find resolutions to accomplish a successful upgrade.

video:video.video:title: Rock Hard: C++ Evolving
video:video.video:description: In this talk, we'll highlight mind-bending examples on the bleeding edge that give you an insight into the unique capabilities of C++ in the 21st century.

video:video.video:title: Windows Azure AppFabric: Building, Managing, and Connecting High-Density, Multi-Tenant Cloud&#8230;
video:video.video:description: In this session, Clemens will provide an overview of the AppFabric services that are already commercially available and the new services that Microsoft will bring to market until the end of this year.

video:video.video:title: Usability in Practice: 10 Keys to a Better User Experience for XAML Based Applications
video:video.video:description: tbd

video:video.video:title: Unlocking the Secrets of REST with WCF
video:video.video:description: In this session we will travel to the very depths of our new WCF WEB stack where there treasures which will delight the RESTful eye.

video:video.video:title: This Costs What? Estimating Costs in the Azure Cloud
video:video.video:description: In this talk, we look at a typical data center deployment costs and then look at building similar systems on Azure to understand what the real differences are.

video:video.video:title: Introduction to Visual Studio Lightswitch
video:video.video:description: In this demo-heavy session, you will see, end-to-end, how to build and deploy a data-centric business application using LightSwitch.

video:video.video:title: Reactive Extensions for .NET for the Rest of Us
video:video.video:description: In this session, a non-rocket-scientist will walk through the basics of Rx from scratch, talking about what problem the framework is trying to solve, the simple interfaces that underpin its workings.

video:video.video:title: What's New in SQL Server "Denali" for Developers
video:video.video:description: By the end of the session you&rsquo;ll understand these features, and understand how to implement these in the latest CTP release of SQL Server &ldquo;Denali&rdquo;.

video:video.video:title: Apps voor het bedrijfsleven: een voorbeeld uit de praktijk van Achmea
video:video.video:description: De presentatie zal ingaan op de verschillende keuzes die gemaakt zijn en de voor- en nadelen daarvan bespreken evenals de 'lessons learned'.

video:video.video:title: Expression Blend voor Developers
video:video.video:description: In deze sessie laat ik zien hoe je gebruik kunt maken van Behaviors, Actions en Triggers en hoe je ze eenvoudig zelf kunt maken.

video:video.video:title: Het Bouwen van Enterprise Silverlight Applications met PRISM
video:video.video:description: Deze sessie legt de verschillende PRISM concepten uit en laat zien hoe je ze kunt toepassen in een applicatie.

video:video.video:title: Building a Custom Video Player with the Silverlight Media Framework for the Web, Desktop and Phone
video:video.video:description: Learn about the open source Silverlight Media Framework for use with Silverlight and Windows Phone and briefly see how this is used by large scale solutions in the world.

video:video.video:title: SharePoint Development for Developers
video:video.video:description: Introduction for (ASP.NET) developers to SharePoint development basics and show their existing development skills can be leveraged in SharePoint 2010 very easily with the help of Visual Studio 2010.

video:video.video:title: OData Everywhere!
video:video.video:description: In this session learn how to use your .NET skills to consume that data from Silverlight, Web (jQuery) and Windows Phone.

video:video.video:title: Whats Coming Next to the Windows Phone 7 codename Mango Application Platform
video:video.video:description: Windows Phone 7 was only the beginning. Later this year we&rsquo;ll release a new version of Windows Phone that will unlock new capabilities for developers. In this session, we&rsquo;ll provide give&#8230;

video:video.video:title: What you as an ASP.NET Developer should know about jQuery
video:video.video:description: In this session we&rsquo;ll take a look at jQuery and we&rsquo;ll teach you what you need to know to get on your way. Specifically, we&rsquo;ll look at selectors, attributes, working with WCF, jQuery&#8230;

video:video.video:title: What's New in Windows Azure
video:video.video:description: At PDC 2010 we introduced several new and exciting features for Windows Azure. In this session we will provide a high-level overview of the new capabilities.

video:video.video:title: MVC 3 101
video:video.video:description: Join Scott Hanselman as he explains ASP.NET MVC from File -&gt; New Project to more advanced topics and ninja tricks!

video:video.video:title: DevDays Keynote
video:video.video:description: In de keynote zal Scott Hanselman een overzicht geven van de ontwikkelingen rond web-development tools. Hij laat zien hoe ontwikkeltools van het eerste uur zoals VB6 en Visual Interdev zijn&#8230;
